data.comment: The match has started.
Botafogo's Bruno Nazario breaks free at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 1, Rodolpho Toski Marques awards Bragantino a goal kick.
Throw-in for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Botafogo just outside Bragantino's area.
In the minute 3, Important block from the Bragantino defence as Keisuke Honda fires in a strike for Botafogo.
Throw-in for Botafogo in the half of Bragantino.
Throw-in for Botafogo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 6, Can Botafogo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bragantino's half?
Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Rodolpho Toski Marques.
In the minute 7, Botafogo surge into the attack at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos but Marcelo Benevenuto’s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Rodolpho Toski Marques awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 10, Throw-in high up the field for Botafogo in Rio de Janeiro.
Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
Victor Luis (Botafogo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 11, Free kick Bragantino.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as Botafogo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 17, Matheus Barcelos da Silva of Botafogo is pulled up for offside.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Botafogo.
In the minute 20, Victor Luis for Botafogo drives towards goal at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Jose Welison for Botafogo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 21, Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Botafogo to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
In the minute 23, Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a Botafogo throw-in in Bragantino's half.
Botafogo's Caio Alexandre gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Bragantino have a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a Bragantino throw-in in Botafogo's half.
Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Botafogo.
Ligger (Bragantino) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 27, Goal kick for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Botafogo.
Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Botafogo's half?
Throw-in Botafogo.
In the minute 30, Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 33, Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Botafogo in their own half.
Throw-in Bragantino.
In the minute 35, Botafogo to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
Botafogo's Eber Bessa misses with an attempt on goal.
Rodolpho Toski Marques awards Bragantino a goal kick.
In the minute 36, Play has been interrupted briefly in Rio de Janeiro to check on Cleiton, who is grimacing with pain.
Cleiton for Bragantino is back on the field again.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 39, It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Marcelo Benevenuto for Botafogo is whistled offside.
In the minute 41, Free kick Bragantino.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a throw-in for Bragantino, close to Botafogo's area.
In the minute 43, Goal kick for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Matheus Barcelos da Silva heads in to make it 1-0 at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Great play from Victor Luis to set up the goal.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Bragantino drive upfield and Ytalo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Botafogo defender.
In the minute 45, Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Rodolpho Toski Marques.
In Rio de Janeiro Bragantino attack through Ligger. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
Goal! Ytalo levels the match at 1-1.
Ricardo Ryller with an assist there.
At Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos, Tomas Cuello has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The second-half is now underway.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
In the minute 47, Bragantino needs to be cautious. Botafogo have an attacking throw-in.
Victor Luis (Botafogo) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, Botafogo have a goal kick.
Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Bragantino at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Rodolpho Toski Marques awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 54, Bragantino's Raul gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Botafogo.
In the minute 55, Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Mauricio Barbieri is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos with Helinho replacing Weverson.
Luan Candido is on a sub for Tomas Cuello for Bragantino.
In the minute 57, Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a Botafogo throw-in in Bragantino's half.
Free kick for Botafogo in the half of Bragantino.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 59, Bruno Nazario (Botafogo) gets in a strike – but the header hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Rodolpho Toski Marques.
Throw-in for Botafogo in the half of Bragantino.
In the minute 61, Rodolpho Toski Marques awards the home team a throw-in.
Bragantino have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
In the minute 64, Bragantino's Aderlan breaks free at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Rodolpho Toski Marques awards Botafogo a goal kick.
Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Botafogo close to the penalty box.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Bragantino.
The home team have replaced Caio Alexandre with Pedro Raul. This is the first substitution made today by Ramon Diaz.
In the minute 67, Bragantino drives forward and Artur gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Botafogo.
Throw-in Botafogo.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Botafogo territory.
In the minute 71, Free kick Botafogo.
Leo Ortiz (Bragantino) gets a yellow card.
Chrigor is replacing Ytalo for Bragantino at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
In the minute 72, Mauricio Barbieri (Bragantino) is making a fourth substitution, with Matheus Jesus replacing Ricardo Ryller.
The home team have replaced Bruno Nazario with Rhuan. This is the second substitution made today by Ramon Diaz.
In the minute 73, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Helinho (Bragantino) has received a yellow card from Rodolpho Toski Marques.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Bragantino push forward at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos and Artur gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Botafogo defence.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Botafogo.
Penalty! Rodolpho Toski Marques points to the spot, great chance for Bragantino...
Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
In the minute 80, Bragantino to take a throw-in in Botafogo territory.
Claudinho converts the penalty to give Bragantino a 1-2 lead.
Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
In the minute 87, Ramon Diaz is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos with Davi Machado dos Santos Araujo replacing Eber Bessa.
Salomon Kalou is replacing Matheus Barcelos da Silva for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 88, The away team replace Claudinho with Fabricio Bruno.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 9 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a Bragantino throw-in in Botafogo's half.
Ball safe as Botafogo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Botafogo.
Bragantino's Matheus Jesus gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Botafogo defender.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Botafogo territory.
Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
Throw-in for Bragantino at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Rodolpho Toski Marques signals a Botafogo throw-in in Bragantino's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Rodolpho Toski Marques.
Botafogo's Salomon Kalou is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Rodolpho Toski Marques.
The match has come to a close in Rio de Janeiro. The final score is 1-2.
